movie.title: An Acrid Yarn
movie.description_intro: Based on real events in a small town where the pastor takes advantage of his female flock.
movie.description_full: Based on real events in a small town where the pastor takes advantage of his female flock.

movies.title: Dream Castle
movies.summary: A film actress falls for an extra on her set, he turns out to be a prince.
movies.description_full: A film actress falls for an extra on her set, he turns out to be a prince.
movies.synopsis: A film actress falls for an extra on her set, he turns out to be a prince.

movies.title: Message Man
movies.summary: A retired assassin's past catches up with him and his brutality surfaces as he goes on a final killing spree to make things right.
movies.description_full: A retired assassin's past catches up with him and his brutality surfaces as he goes on a final killing spree to make things right.
movies.synopsis: A retired assassin's past catches up with him and his brutality surfaces as he goes on a final killing spree to make things right.

movies.title: The Resurrected
movies.summary: Charles Dexter Ward's wife enlists the help of a private detective to find out what her husband is up to in a remote cabin owned by his family for centuries. The husband is a chemical engineer, and the smells from his experiments (and the delivery of what appear to be human remains at all hours) are beginning to arouse the attention of neighbors and local law enforcement officials. When the detective and wife find a diary of the husband's ancestor from 1771, and reports of gruesome murders in the area begin to surface, they begin to suspect that some very unnatural experiments are being conducted in the old house. Based on an H.P. Lovecraft story.

movies.title: Alleycats
movies.summary: When bike courier Chris witnesses what looks like a murder, his first instinct is to cut and run. But when his curiosity draws him back in, he's soon embroiled in a world of corruption, political power, and illegal bike racing.
